name: Jollof Rice & Chicken
description: Classic smoky Nigerian jollof served with a large piece of fried chicken.

name: Pounded Yam & Egusi
description: Smooth pounded yam served with rich Egusi soup containing beef and shaki.

name: White Rice & Ayamase
description: Ofada-style green pepper sauce with diced offals and boiled egg.

name: Beef Suya (Full Portion)
description: Spiced grilled beef served with onions, cabbage, and extra yaji spice.

name: Chicken Shawarma
description: Double sausage shawarma with creamy garlic sauce and spicy chicken.

name: Beef Burger & Fries
description: Homemade beef patty with lettuce, cheese, and a side of crispy fries.

name: Eba & Okro Soup
description: Yellow garri served with fresh seafood okro soup.

name: Fried Rice & Turkey
description: Vegetable fried rice paired with a crispy golden fried turkey wing.

name: Gizdodo
description: A delicious mix of peppered gizzard and fried plantain cubes.

name: Catfish Pepper Soup
description: Fresh catfish in a spicy, aromatic broth with local herbs.

name: Afang Soup & Fufu
description: Rich Calabar Afang soup made with waterleaf and okazi, served with fufu.

name: Ekpang Nkukwo
description: Traditional coco-yam pottage wrapped in leaves with periwinkles and dried fish.

name: Beans & Fried Plantain
description: Honey beans cooked to perfection with a side of sweet dodo.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Pasta tossed in a rich minced meat and tomato sauce.

name: Zobo Drink (50cl)
description: Chilled hibiscus flower drink infused with ginger and pineapple.

name: Meat Pie
description: Flaky pastry filled with seasoned minced meat, carrots, and potatoes.

name: Amala & Abula
description: Black yam flour served with Gbegiri, Ewedu, and pepper sauce.

name: Club Sandwich
description: Toasted bread layers with egg, chicken, mayo, and vegetables.

name: Moin Moin
description: Steamed bean pudding with eggs and fish.

name: Fresh Pineapple Juice
description: 100% freshly squeezed pineapple with no added sugar.

name: Asun (Peppered Goat)
description: Spicy roasted goat meat chopped into bite-sized pieces.

name: Puff Puff (Set of 4)
description: Deep-fried sweet dough balls, soft and chewy.

name: Stir-fry Noodles
description: Indomie stir-fry with mixed vegetables and a fried egg.

name: Semo & Ogbono Soup
description: Semovita served with thick, drawy Ogbono soup.

name: Grilled Fish
description: Whole grilled Tilapia served with spicy sauce and chips.

name: Bottled Water (75cl)
description: Premium chilled table water.

name: Coconut Rice
description: Rice cooked in savory coconut milk and local spices.

name: Yam Pottage (Asaro)
description: Creamy yam porridge cooked in palm oil with peppers and dried crustacea.

name: Chapman Drink
description: A classic Nigerian mocktail with Angostura bitters and fruity sodas.

name: Chicken Pie
description: Shortcrust pastry filled with creamy chicken and vegetable filling.
